name: Whiteout (itch) (Kai)
description:
You play as a secret service agent. Your agency has sent you out to frigid Northern Canada to investigate a private company known as Crescent Inc... 

The company is off the grid and nested deep in the mountains. You are on a cargo transfer flight with 2 other passengers, no commercial flights go this far up north.

When your plane crashes in the mountains, and you are met with important decisions and you must adapt. 



  1. - Main Theme *
  2. - Realization
  3. - Terrible Feeling *
  4. - Hopeful
  5. - Longest Hour
  6. - Frosted Vision
  7. - Steady Pace
  8. - The Mountain
  9.  - Unplanned
  10. - Slow Whisper
  11. - End Credits *
  12. - Beta Main Theme
  13. - Beta End Theme

Timestamps are available in the comments section of the video. Make sure to check out End Credits, it's the best one.
Enjoy the music!


  • Game has mature themes and topics.
  • Game is slow paced and thoughtful.

  • WASD = Walk
  • CTRL = Crouch
  • SHIFT = Sprint
  • E = Interact
  • ESC = Quit
  • Players attempting to break the game on purpose will probably end up breaking something, if you want a good experience, don't try and break it. 
  • 'Jack' is not showing up in the playtesters credits section.
  • Music can overlap sometimes.
  • Players that attempt to jump off the mountains, will get stuck.
  • Players can get stuck on rocks sometimes.
  • Players can get stuck on Conner's Watchtower sometimes. (Crouch spamming can get you unstuck.)
     

 

Other:

Game is best played alone.
 Whiteout does not currently have a save system. The game must be completed in 1 sitting for the best experience.

If you plan on making a video on Whiteout, link it below and I will add it to the Whiteout playlist on YouTube.
Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL25hw_Ncqb2aznACzhjo5iY49p33kSE2d
